features.additionalInfo: See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank or on the go in the CommBank app.
Access your own business funds to pay bills and suppliers online, over the phone or in person.
Regardless of your business structure and needs, we have an online banking solution that will suit you.
We'll tell you when your online bill payment is due.
Set alerts in the CommBank app or NetBank and we'll instantly tell you if your account balance is low, high or if you've just been paid.
Rather than wait hours or days for payments from another bank to clear, receive money almost instantly, so you know exactly where your business stands financially.

Customers with the $10 Monthly Account Fee option will receive 20 Quick Deposit, Cheque and Assisted transactions each calendar month. The $0 Monthly Account Fee option does not include any assisted transactions - each assisted transaction will be chargeable. At the end of each month, the Bank will rank these transactions in the following order: 1. Quick Deposits - cash and cheque deposits 2. Cheque transactions 3. Assisted transactions.
Streamline your business banking and save time with automatic data feeds from your online banking to your accounting software.
Securely lock your debit card in the CommBank app when you need to. And unlock it again when you don't.
Your free business insights tool available in CommBiz and NetBank.

Customers have the ability to switch between the available fee options at any time. The $10 Monthly Account Fee option includes 20 assisted transactions, and the $0 Monthly Account Fee option does not include any assisted transactions. Monthly Account Fees are calculated at the end of each month and charged to your account on the first day of the following month. Monthly Account Fee payable for partial months is calculated pro-rata on a daily basis.
You may apply to establish an overdraft limit on an eligible account. Applications are subject to our normal credit approval.

Unlimited CommBank ATM withdrawals in Australia; Customers with the $10 monthly account fee pricing option will receive up to 20 cheques, staff assisted or quick deposit transactions. Fees and charges will apply if you exceed this amount. Customers with the $0 monthly account fee pricing option will not have included assisted transactions - each assisted transaction will be chargeable. Please note Access, CommBiz and NetBank Service Fees may apply and are excluded from the unlimited electronic transactions. Additional fees apply for: international transactions, travellers cheques, foreign currency and sending money overseas; special banking services, such as bank cheques and special clearance of cheques.

eligibility.additionalInfo: To be eligible you need to have a valid ABN, ACN, or an association created and operating in Australia. Further Eligibility depends on your specific organisation structure. Please see CommBank website below for more information.

fees.name: Assisted deposits
fees.additionalInfo: Deposits made over the counter at a Commonwealth Bank branch, Australia Post office or private agency (including EFTPOB/Bank@Post).

fees.name: Cheque transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques deposited to your account (including cheques deposited via Quick Deposits or QuickCash envelope banking).

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: $5 per payment. Charged to the account, due to insufficient available funds, when we are unable to debit the account after five attempts.

fees.name: Paper Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A paper statement fee applies to account when you request a paper copy of an account statement outside the standard cycle.

fees.name: Overdraw Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you exceed the available funds in your account or any agreed overdraft limit on a given day. Additional interest may apply on overdrawn amounts.

fees.name: EFTPOS in Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Cash withdrawals or purchases made via EFTPOS in Australia or utilising the 'credit' option with your Business Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard.

fees.name: Pricing Option 1 - $10 Monthly account fee
fees.additionalInfo: Calculated at the end of each month and charged to your account on the first day of the following month. Up to 20 cheques, staff assisted or quick deposit transactions included with this fee option.  Fees apply when the number of Quick Deposit, Cheque and Assisted Transactions for the month exceed the relevant number of transactions included in the Monthly Account Fee.

fees.name: Pricing Option 2 - $0 Monthly account fee
fees.additionalInfo: Calculated at the end of each month and charged to your account on the first day of the following month. This pricing option does not include any assisted transactions - each assisted transaction will be chargeable.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Maestro (EFTPOS) or Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard purchase in Australian dollars: 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Maestro (EFTPOS) or Visa Debit Card or Debit MasterCard purchase in foreign currency: 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Coin handling fee
fees.additionalInfo: The coin handling is 1% of the total value of the coin component of all deposit and withdrawal transactions, where the total value of coins handled exceeds $1,000 per day. This fee is debited on the day the transactions are processed. This fee does not apply to deposits made via QuickCash envelopes.

fees.name: Note handling fee
fees.additionalInfo: The note handling is 0.25% of the total value of the notes component of all deposit and withdrawal transactions, where the total value of notes handled exceeds $50,000 per day. This fee is debited on the day the transactions are processed. This fee does not apply to deposits made via QuickCash envelopes.

fees.name: Withdrawals or transfers made via telephone banking using an operator
fees.additionalInfo: Withdrawals or transfers made via telephone banking using an operator.

fees.name: Cheques transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques written by you and negotiated through the clearing system.

fees.name: Assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Cheques drawn on your account and cashed over-the-counter at any Commonwealth Bank branch.

fees.name: Electronic transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Customers with a Business Transaction Account are entitled to unlimited free electronic transactions. Please note Access, CommBiz and NetBank Service Fees may apply and are excluded from the unlimited electronic transactions.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawal overseas: AUD $5 plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: Access fee - Overseas transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Any other cash withdrawal overseas: AUD $5 plus 3% of the transaction value.

fees.name: CommBank ATMs outside Australia
fees.additionalInfo: The fee is charged to the account at the time of the withdrawal. This fee may be charged for each withdrawal you make through ATMs and Maestro, Cirrus, MasterCard or Visa Plus networks outside Australia.

fees.name: Assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Withdrawals made over the counter at a Commonwealth Bank branch, Australia Post office or private agency (including EFTPOB/Bank@Post).

lendingRates.additionalInfo: If we allow you to exceed your Overdraft limit, the Excess Drawing Rate will apply for each day your limit is exceeded (excluding Simple Business Overdraft).

data.name: Business Transaction Account
data.description: An everyday business bank account that you can open online, which provides unlimited electronic transactions and 20 assisted transactions on a monthly basis for customers on the $10 monthly account fee pricing option. Fees and charges will apply if you exceed this amount. Customers with the $0 monthly account fee pricing option will not have included assisted transactions - each assisted transaction will be chargeable. Please note Access, CommBiz and NetBank Service Fees may apply and are excluded from the unlimited electronic transactions.
